alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:53PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake County through 530 PM PDT... At 452 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Abert Rim Geology, or 31 miles northeast of Lakeview, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Highway Well Rest Area. This includes the following highways... US 395 in Oregon between mile markers 57 and 79. Highway 139 in Modoc County California Highway 139 in Siskiyou County California Highway 39 in Oregon MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
